body: While a weapon made of alchemical silver reduces damage by 1, with a minimum of 1 point of damage, it may be more effective than other weapons against certain outsiders. It has 10 hit points per inch of thickness and hardness 8.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Binding Outsiders/Dealing with Outsiders/Anathematic Substances/Alchemical Silver
name: Alchemical Silver
